channel.title: Hack A Website*, and other adventures in Technology
channel.description: Recent content on Hack A Website*, and other adventures in Technology

item.title: Technical Career Knowledge Roadmap
item.description: To those who want to learn Computer Security: Make sure you don’t focus solely on JUST what is considered cybersecurty and hacking, and instead learn a fair bit about how computers and networks work as well. Here is a rough list: A bit of programing. At least enough to be able to write a script to process text. A bit of digital electronics. At least enough to know what a and gate and a xor is.

item.title: Python Review
item.description: What is this Document This document is to get someone who knows how to program up to speed with python. It may also help compare languages. Tooling using the system python is mostly a trap pip is the package manager pyenv is a common installer/interpreter manager but there are others virtualenvs are a another name for a separate interpreter environment Basic Notes Scope is defined by indentation level, no brackets. OO, procedural and functional programming are all supported well.
